price: Akasema: Hawa binti zangu, ikiwa nyinyi ni watendaji.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: Ili kuwanabihisha njia ya maumbile ya kisharia, Nabii wa Mwenyezi Mungu Luut'i akasema: Hawa mabinti wa mji huu, nao ni binti zangu, waoeni ikiwa mnataka kukidhi matamanio yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
